Articles.Content:
Speaks for itself. When I enter the VAB I cant click anything. The cursor changes colour in response the clicks but thats it, I have to alt-F4 out of the game.

I looked at the Output_LOG for entering editor and it was this:

------------------- initializing editor mode... ------------------

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!

(Filename: Line: 1771)

editor started

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!

(Filename: Line: 1771)

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!

(Filename: Line: 1771)

IconLoader awake

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

[RDTechTree]: No tech node found called

(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

[RDTechTree]: No tech node found called

-Repeat this 50 times

-----------------------------------------------------

Removing ModuleManager and editing the .persistent to remove the modulemanger.techtree reference fixes this, but means I cant use half my mods in career mode.
Also can anyone tell me how to attatch a file so I can attatch the log?

I also get this problem

It doesn't happen at first, but after I've done 20 missions it locks up

Edited October 18, 2015 by nsgallup
To attach a file, simply upload it to any file host online, and post a link here.
